scripts.android:release: cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd .. && react-native run-android --variant release
scripts.android:clean-rebuild: yarn clean:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd .. && react-native run-android
scripts.build:ios: react-native build-ios --scheme TwilioVerifyForReactNativeExample --mode Debug --extra-params "-sdk iphonesimulator CC=clang CPLUSPLUS=clang++ LD=clang LDPLUSPLUS=clang++ GCC_OPTIMIZATION_LEVEL=0 GCC_PRECOMPILE_PREFIX_HEADER=YES ASSETCATALOG_COMPILER_OPTIMIZATION=time DEBUG_INFORMATION_FORMAT=dwarf COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO"
scripts.prepare:ios: cd ios && bundle install && pod install && cd ..
scripts.prepare:android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev true --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.clean:ios: cd ios && rm -rf Pods Podfile.lock && cd ..
scripts.clean:android: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && rm -rf node_modules && yarn
